com.ning.billing.osgi.api

Interface OSGIServiceRegistration<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The OSGI service exported by Killbill bundles
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPaymentProviderPluginRegistry, DefaultServletRouter

    public interface OSGIServiceRegistration<T>
    The purpose is to register within Killbill OSGI services that were exported by specific Killbill plugins

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<String> getAllServiceForPluginName() 
      T getServiceForPluginName(String pluginName) 
      Class<T> getServiceType() 
      void registerService(String pluginName, T service) 
      void unregisterService(String pluginName) 

    • Method Detail

      • registerService

        void registerService(String pluginName,
                   T service)
        Parameters:
        pluginName - the name of plugin
        service - the instance that should be registered

      • unregisterService

        void unregisterService(String pluginName)
        Parameters:
        pluginName - the name of plugin

      • getServiceForPluginName

        T getServiceForPluginName(String pluginName)
        Parameters:
        pluginName - the name of plugin
        Returns:
        the instance that was registered under that name

      • getAllServiceForPluginName

        Set<String> getAllServiceForPluginName()
        Returns:
        the set of all the plugins registered

      • getServiceType

        Class<T> getServiceType()
        Returns:
        the type of service that is registered under that OSGIServiceRegistration
